welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Willowbrook, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a range of services including fueling, maintenance, and hangar rentals.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers and visitors.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport houses the airport administration offices and provides access to the runway and hangars.

terminals.name: Hangar Terminal
terminals.description: The hangar terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for private and commercial aircraft storage and maintenance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and hangar areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at LAX, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modernized terminal with a variety of dining and shopping options, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A recently renovated terminal with a spacious layout and a wide selection of amenities, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and most modern terminal at LAX, serving international flights and featuring a variety of luxury amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A recently renovated terminal with a focus on sustainability, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal with a modern design and a wide range of dining and shopping options, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: A spacious and modern terminal with a variety of amenities, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A newly renovated terminal with a focus on technology and convenience, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of amenities, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and efficient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Santa Ynez Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights at Santa Ynez Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
